short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add links to your bookmarks toolbar the old fashion way... by sending them through texts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linkstash is an SMS bookmarks manager. Send our phone number a link to a webpage and watch it show up in a folder on your bookmarks toolbar.

Use Linkstash for a convenient and easy way to save web pages to read later, without having to worry about losing them and the added convenience of having them loaded directing to your browser.

Get more information @ devprojects.io/linkstash
